1.content: OK before we begin the story We need to know who is being transformed and what gender they are. So what gender are you
1.title: to start with

11.content:
OK so here is where the story will branch out so i will go with my characters and leave a other option for your own characters.
p.s my characters are all detailed in the information area at the start you have to create a description of your characters in your next chapter after saying who your character is
11.title: Male

111.content:
IT was finally time. Time to go back to Hogwarts after the long summer of not using magic it was finally time to go back. You had packed everything a while in advance and now you had everything ready. You said goodbye to your parents as you went for the short walk down to diagonally through the muggle side the leaky cauldron.

When you made it through you saw your friends Rachel, Rebekah and Gareth all from Gryfindor the same as you. The first stop you had to make was to gringots to get some gold from your vault. Then you went to get a new unifrom as your dog had got at your last one. When you walked in the girls went off ahead and you and Gareth followed them. they went over to the girls section so you waited on them as they said they would help pick out another uniform for you. then they dared you to try on a piece of girls clothes. You initially refused but then you said you would just for a laugh. So you went over and tried on
111.title: Daniel (16)

1113.content: what else could you try on
1113.title: other

choices: Rahel wants to try you on
Rebekah wants to try you on
11132.content:
You went to look what you could wear. You decide to go for some shoes as they wouldnt be too embarrassing if you wear them. You looked at the shoes as you touched the flat black leather shoes.

Rachel and Rebekah were waiting for you as they looked around some more. You see them comming towards you. They stopped right infront of you as thet looked at you
11132.title: flat shoes

11133.content: Maybe you change your mind and don't put any of them on
11133.title: other

111331.content:
You tell them you've changed your mind and aren't going to try them on and so they agree so you go and get your uniform then leave to go to the train station and nothing much happens then until you reach Hogwarts

When you arrive you all go and sit at the Gryfindor table for the feast and to watch the sorting ceremony for the first years. the feast seemed to get better every year. You then finished eating and went up to the common room. In the common room there was a sign saying for those interested in self transformation lessons should sign up but there was no name of what teacher was doing them but you and your friends all signed up for them as you had never heard of self transformation and thought it could be fun.

The first lesson for self transformation was after regular lessons that day so you had defence against the dark arts with professor titanium (not real in movies i made it up) where you learnt the stunning spell and it was only the first day. Then you had potions with professor Snape who hated all gryfindors even the great harry Potter who you had met a few times before. But through all the lessons none of the teachers mentioned the self transformation and none of the other houses had heard of them.

But you finished your lessons and went to the library where the self transformation was meant to be. Then you heard a voice behind you saying Daniel, Gareth, Rachel and Rebekah you must be here for self transformation I expected you'd sign up for it.

you recognized the voice it was
111331.title: yes

1113312.content: Is the voice who is talking to you possibly professor slughorn
1113312.title: other

11133122.content: OK other options what about dumbledore
11133122.title: no

111331222.content: OK then is it Malfoy tricking you
111331222.title: nope

1113312222.content: someone else from gryfindor house if not come up with your own chapter
1113312222.title: defenitely not

1113322.content: was it a a bra
1113322.title: next

What is he and who is he with?
1131.title: Adam age 22

12.content:
OK so here is where the story will branch out so i will go with my characters and leave a other option for your own characters.
p.s my characters are all detailed in the information area at the start you have to create a description of your characters in your next chapter after saying who your character is
12.title: Female

info.brief_description: You are transformed in hogwarts into an inanimate object what will you do
info.description:
OK you can have as many characters as you want just always leave room for more characters by putting in other characters. Then just write a description in the next chapter. P.S remember to say which house they are in and it can be any of the 4 houses

My main characters I will be going on about will be
Daniel: 16 medium brown hair, average height, 5th year like experimenting with all areas both potions and magic(gryfindor)
Gareth: 14 long black hair, smaller than some others 3rd year likes using potions (gryfindor

Rachel: 16 long blond hair, Average height, 5th year enjoys experimenting with magic (gryfindor)
Rebekah : 17 long brown hair, taller than other girls, 6th year enjoys potions (gryfindor)

rules
1. No coming across main movie characters and transforming them but they can use your transformed self and transform you (if applicable)
2. only your character can be transformed
3. try make it all female objects
4. try make it so they can be either another object at some point or be the same object and be used by someone else
5. no swearing
6. avoid one liners try keep at least a few lines ( I may include a few but even then I will try to avoid short ones I'll probably just use them to get the story going then I will follow this rule as well)
7. others including teachers can transform you as well as you being able to transform yourself

just so you know girls uniform at hogwarts consists of a black skirt, black shoes, tights, a shirt , a Grey jumper, a Grey pinafore ( instead of skirt and jumper). After lessons the students are allowed to wear their own clothes instead of uniform and you can make the ule ball happen again if you want ( like a prom at hogwarts from the 4th harry potter movie)

OK that's it then make additions and if you keep to the rules I will send you GP if you make an addition

Have fun
